copyright: libaprsroute - APRS header only routing library
description: This file contains test data for evaluating and testing an APRS router, particularly for digipeater testing.
You are free to use, modify, and distribute this test asset for any purpose under the terms of the CC-BY 4.0 license.

comments: while we match the DIGI1-3 address, we have other unused addresses in front of it
so we can't route the packet using n-N routing
with preempt_truncate, all addresses up to DIGI2-1 are dropped
